GE07mbh_11_u:59: 11,001.023e svārthaś ca na kṛtaḥ kaś cil lubdhena phalagṛddhinā
GE07mbh_11_u:62: 11,001.024a tava duḥśāsano mantrī rādheyaś ca durātmavān

GE07mbh_11_u:76: 11,001.027a madhyastho hi tvam apy āsīr na kṣamaṃ kiṃ cid uktavān
GE07mbh_11_u:77: 11,001.027c dhūr dhareṇa tvayā bhāras tulayā na samaṃ dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:78: 11,001.028a ādāv eva manuṣyeṇa vartitavyaṃ yathā kṣamam
GE07mbh_11_u:79: 11,001.028c yathā nātītam arthaṃ vai paścāttāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_11_u:80: 11,001.029a putragṛddhyā tvayā rājan priyaṃ tasya cikīrṣatā

GE07mbh_11_u:102: 11,002.002a uttiṣṭha rājan kiṃ śeṣe dhārayātmānam ātmanā

GE07mbh_11_u:110: 11,002.005c kālaṃ prāpya mahārāja na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_11_u:113: 11,002.005d*0007_03 na śocan mṛtam anveti na śocan mriyate naraḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:120: 11,002.005d*0007_10 yasya kālaḥ prayāty agre tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:121: 11,002.006a na cāpy etān hatān yuddhe rājañ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:122: 11,002.006c pramāṇaṃ yadi śāstrāṇi gatās te paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:123: 11,002.007a sarve svādhyāyavanto hi sarve ca caritavratāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:124: 11,002.007c sarve cābhimukhāḥ kṣīṇās tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:126: 11,002.008c na te tava na teṣāṃ tvaṃ tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:127: 11,002.009a hato 'pi labhate svargaṃ hatvā ca labhate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:128: 11,002.009c ubhayaṃ no bahuguṇaṃ nāsti niṣphalatā raṇe
GE07mbh_11_u:131: 11,002.011a na yajñair dakṣiṇāvadbhir na tapobhir na vidyayā

GE07mbh_11_u:134: 11,002.011d*0008_02 hūyamānāñ śarāṃś caiva sehus tejasvino mithaḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:136: 11,002.011d*0008_04 na yuddhād adhikaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyasyeha vidyate
GE07mbh_11_u:138: 11,002.011d*0008_06 āśiṣaḥ paramāḥ prāptā na śocyāḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_11_u:140: 11,002.011d*0008_08 nādya śokābhibhūtas tvaṃ kāryam utsraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:142: 11,002.012c saṃsāreṣv anubhūtāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
GE07mbh_11_u:144: 11,002.013c divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_11_u:145: 11,002.014a na kālasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyaḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_11_u:146: 11,002.014c na madhyasthaḥ kva cit kālaḥ sarvaṃ kālaḥ prakarṣati
GE07mbh_11_u:147: 11,002.014d*0009_01 kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:148: 11,002.014d*0009_02 kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:150: 11,002.015c ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:151: 11,002.016a na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:152: 11,002.016c apy abhāvena yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
GE07mbh_11_u:154: 11,002.017c bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_11_u:155: 11,002.017e cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaś cāpi vivardhate
GE07mbh_11_u:159: 11,002.019a nārtho na dharmo na sukhaṃ yad etad anuśocasi
GE07mbh_11_u:160: 11,002.019c na ca nāpaiti kāryārthāt trivargāc caiva bhraśyate

GE07mbh_11_u:179: 11,003.001c bhuya eva tu vākyāni śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:183: 11,003.003a yato yato mano duḥkhāt sukhād vāpi pramucyate
GE07mbh_11_u:184: 11,003.003c tatas tataḥ śamaṃ labdhvā sugatiṃ vindate budhaḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:193: 11,003.005a gṛhāṇy eva hi martyānām āhur dehāni paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:194: 11,003.005c kālena viniyujyante sattvam ekaṃ tu śobhanam
GE07mbh_11_u:195: 11,003.006a yathā jīrṇam ajīrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ tyaktvā tu vai naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:196: 11,003.006c anyad rocayate vastram evaṃ dehāḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:197: 11,003.007a vaicitravīrya vāsaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ vā yadi vā sukham
GE07mbh_11_u:199: 11,003.008a karmaṇā prāpyate svargaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:200: 11,003.008c tato vahati taṃ bhāram avaśaḥ svavaśo 'pi vā

GE07mbh_11_u:202: 11,003.009c kiṃ cit prakriyamāṇaṃ vā kṛtamātram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:203: 11,003.010a chinnaṃ vāpy avaropyantam avatīrṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:204: 11,003.010c ārdraṃ vāpy atha vā śuṣkaṃ pacyamānam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:206: 11,003.011c atha vā paribhujyantam evaṃ dehāḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:207: 11,003.012a garbhastho vā prasūto vāpy atha vā divasāntaraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:211: 11,003.014a prākkarmabhis tu bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:213: 11,003.015a yathā ca salile rājan krīḍārtham anusaṃcaran
GE07mbh_11_u:214: 11,003.015c unmajjec ca nimajjec ca kiṃ cit sattvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_11_u:218: 11,003.017a ye tu prājñāḥ sthitāḥ satye saṃsārāntagaveṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:219: 11,003.017c samāgamajñā bhūtānāṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:222: 11,004.001c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:227: 11,004.003a tataḥ sa pañcame 'tīte māse māṃsaṃ prakalpayet

GE07mbh_11_u:233: 11,004.006a tasmān muktaḥ sa saṃsārād anyān paśyaty upadravān
GE07mbh_11_u:235: 11,004.007a tataḥ prāptottare kāle vyādhayaś cāpi taṃ tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:239: 11,004.008e badhyamānaś ca tair bhūyo naiva tṛptim upaiti saḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:243: 11,004.009c yamadūtair vikṛṣyaṃś ca mṛtyuṃ kālena gacchati
GE07mbh_11_u:244: 11,004.010a vāgghīnasya ca yanmātram iṣṭāniṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ mukhe
GE07mbh_11_u:246: 11,004.011a aho vinikṛto loko lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:250: 11,004.013a mūrkhān iti parān āha nātmānaṃ samavekṣate
GE07mbh_11_u:251: 11,004.013c śikṣāṃ kṣipati cānyeṣāṃ nātmānaṃ śāstum icchati
GE07mbh_11_u:252: 11,004.013d*0017_01 yadā prājñāś ca mūḍhāś ca dhanavanto 'tha nirdhanāḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:260: 11,004.013d*0017_09 pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca yo niśamya śrutiṃ tv imām
GE07mbh_11_u:263: 11,004.015a evaṃ sarvaṃ viditvā vai yas tattvam anuvartate
GE07mbh_11_u:267: 11,005.001c etad vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ buddhimārgaṃ praśaṃsa me
GE07mbh_11_u:271: 11,005.003a kaś cin mahati saṃsāre vartamāno dvijaḥ kila
GE07mbh_11_u:276: 11,005.005a tad asya dṛṣṭvā hṛdayam udvegam agamat param
GE07mbh_11_u:277: 11,005.005c abhyucchrayaś ca romṇāṃ vai vikriyāś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_11_u:278: 11,005.005d*0019_01 vepathuś cābhavad gātre romaharṣaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:279: 11,005.006a sa tad vanaṃ vyanusaran vipradhāvan itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:280: 11,005.006c vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ śaraṇaṃ kva bhaved iti
GE07mbh_11_u:281: 11,005.007a sa teṣāṃ chidram anvicchan pradruto bhayapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:282: 11,005.007c na ca niryāti vai dūraṃ na ca tair viprayujyate
GE07mbh_11_u:289: 11,005.011a papāta sa dvijas tatra nigūḍhe salilāśaye
GE07mbh_11_u:292: 11,005.012c sa tathā lambate tatra ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:293: 11,005.013a atha tatrāpi cānyo 'sya bhūyo jāta upadravaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:301: 11,005.015e āsate madhu saṃbhṛtya pūrvam eva niketajāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:303: 11,005.016c svādanīyāni bhūtānāṃ na yair bālo 'pi tṛpyate
GE07mbh_11_u:304: 11,005.017a teṣāṃ madhūnāṃ bahudhā dhārā prasravate sadā
GE07mbh_11_u:305: 11,005.017c tāṃ lambamānaḥ sa pumān dhārāṃ pibati sarvadā
GE07mbh_11_u:306: 11,005.017e na cāsya tṛṣṇā viratā pibamānasya saṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_11_u:307: 11,005.018a abhīpsati ca tāṃ nityam atṛptaḥ sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:308: 11,005.018c na cāsya jīvite rājan nirvedaḥ samajāyata
GE07mbh_11_u:310: 11,005.019c kṛṣṇāḥ śvetāś ca taṃ vṛkṣaṃ kuṭṭayanti sma mūṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:311: 11,005.020a vyālaiś ca vanadurgānte striyā ca paramograyā
GE07mbh_11_u:312: 11,005.020c kūpādhastāc ca nāgena vīnāhe kuñjareṇa ca

GE07mbh_11_u:318: 11,006.001a aho khalu mahad duḥkhaṃ kṛcchravāsaṃ vasaty asau
GE07mbh_11_u:319: 11,006.001c kathaṃ tasya ratis tatra tuṣṭir vā vadatāṃ vara

GE07mbh_11_u:343: 11,006.011a yās tu tā bahuśo dhārāḥ sravanti madhunisravam
GE07mbh_11_u:344: 11,006.011c tāṃs tu kāmarasān vidyād yatra majjanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:345: 11,006.012a evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya parivṛttiṃ sma ye viduḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:363: 11,007.007a śārīrā mānasāś caiva martyānāṃ ye tu vyādhayaḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:365: 11,007.008a kliśyamānāś ca tair nityaṃ hanyamānāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:367: 11,007.009a athāpi tair vimucyeta vyādhibhiḥ puruṣo nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:368: 11,007.009c āvṛṇoty eva taṃ paścāj jarā rūpavināśinī

GE07mbh_11_u:376: 11,007.013c indriyāṇi hayān āhuḥ karma buddhiś ca raśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:377: 11,007.014a teṣāṃ hayānāṃ yo vegaṃ dhāvatām anudhāvati
GE07mbh_11_u:379: 11,007.014d*0023_01 bhramamāṇā na muhyanti saṃsāre na bhramanti te

GE07mbh_11_u:385: 11,007.015a yas tān yamayate buddhyā sa yantā na nivartate

GE07mbh_11_u:393: 11,007.018a na vikramo na cāpy artho na mitraṃ na suhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:396: 11,007.019a tasmān maitraṃ samāsthāya śīlam āpadya bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:397: 11,007.019c damas tyāgo 'pramādaś ca te trayo brahmaṇo hayāḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:413: 11,008.001a vidurasya tu tad vākyaṃ niśamya kurusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:415: 11,008.002a taṃ tathā patitaṃ bhūmau niḥsaṃjñaṃ prekṣya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:416: 11,008.002c kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva kṣattā ca viduras tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:417: 11,008.003a saṃjayaḥ suhṛdaś cānye dvāḥsthā ye cāsya saṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:419: 11,008.004a paspṛśuś ca karair gātraṃ vījamānāś ca yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:423: 11,008.006a dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ mānuṣye ca parigraham
GE07mbh_11_u:427: 11,008.008a yena dahyanti gātrāṇi yena prajñā vinaśyati
GE07mbh_11_u:429: 11,008.009a tad idaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ mayā bhāgyaviparyayāt
GE07mbh_11_u:432: 11,008.010a ity uktvā tu mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ brahmavittamam
GE07mbh_11_u:433: 11,008.010c dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhavan mūḍhaḥ śokaṃ ca paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:434: 11,008.010e abhūc ca tūṣṇīṃ rājāsau dhyāyamāno mahīpate
GE07mbh_11_u:435: 11,008.011a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:437: 11,008.012a dhṛtarāṣṭra mahābāho yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_11_u:439: 11,008.013a na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid veditavyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_11_u:440: 11,008.013c anityatāṃ hi martyānāṃ vijānāsi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:441: 11,008.014a adhruve jīvaloke ca sthāne vāśāśvate sati
GE07mbh_11_u:442: 11,008.014c jīvite maraṇānte ca kasmāc chocasi bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:444: 11,008.015c putraṃ te kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā kālayogena kāritaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:445: 11,008.016a avaśyaṃ bhavitavye ca kurūṇāṃ vaiśase nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:446: 11,008.016c kasmāc chocasi tāñ śūrān gatān paramikāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:449: 11,008.018a na ca daivakṛto mārgaḥ śakyo bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_11_u:450: 11,008.018c ghaṭatāpi ciraṃ kālaṃ niyantum iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:451: 11,008.019a devatānāṃ hi yat kāryaṃ mayā pratyakṣataḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_11_u:452: 11,008.019c tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi kathaṃ sthairyaṃ bhavet tava
GE07mbh_11_u:453: 11,008.020a purāhaṃ tvarito yātaḥ sabhām aindrīṃ jitaklamaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:454: 11,008.020c apaśyaṃ tatra ca tadā samavetān divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:456: 11,008.021a tatra cāpi mayā dṛṣṭā pṛthivī pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_11_u:458: 11,008.022a upagamya tadā dhātrī devān āha samāgatān
GE07mbh_11_u:459: 11,008.022c yat kāryaṃ mama yuṣmābhir brahmaṇaḥ sadane tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:461: 11,008.023a tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viṣṇur lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:463: 11,008.024a dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇāṃ yas tu jyeṣṭhaḥ śatasya vai
GE07mbh_11_u:464: 11,008.024c duryodhana iti khyātaḥ sa te kāryaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:465: 11,008.024e taṃ ca prāpya mahīpālaṃ kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:468: 11,008.026a tatas te bhavitā devi bhārasya yudhi nāśanam
GE07mbh_11_u:469: 11,008.026c gaccha śīghraṃ svakaṃ sthānaṃ lokān dhāraya śobhane
GE07mbh_11_u:470: 11,008.027a sa eṣa te suto rājaṃl lokasaṃhārakāraṇāt

GE07mbh_11_u:475: 11,008.029*0030_02 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_11_u:476: 11,008.029a śakunir mātulaś caiva karṇaś ca paramaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_11_u:478: 11,008.029d*0029_01 yādṛśo jāyate rājā tādṛśo 'sya jano bhavet
GE07mbh_11_u:479: 11,008.029d*0029_02 adharmo dharmatāṃ yāti svāmī ced dhārmiko bhavet
GE07mbh_11_u:480: 11,008.029d*0029_03 svāmino guṇadoṣābhyāṃ bhṛtyāḥ syur nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:481: 11,008.029d*0029_04 duṣṭaṃ rājānam āsādya gatās te tanayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:482: 11,008.029e etam arthaṃ mahābāho nārado veda tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:484: 11,008.030c mā tāñ śocasva rājendra na hi śoke 'sti kāraṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:485: 11,008.031a na hi te pāṇḍavāḥ svalpam aparādhyanti bhārata

GE07mbh_11_u:492: 11,008.034c etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ devaguhyaṃ sanātanam

GE07mbh_11_u:499: 11,008.038a anatikramaṇīyo hi vidhī rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_11_u:500: 11,008.038c kṛtāntasya hi bhūtena sthāvareṇa trasena ca

GE07mbh_11_u:502: 11,008.039c muhyate prāṇināṃ jñātvā gatiṃ cāgatim eva ca

GE07mbh_11_u:504: 11,008.040c jñātvā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā prāṇān api parityajet
GE07mbh_11_u:506: 11,008.041c sa kathaṃ tvayi rājendra kṛpāṃ vai na kariṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:507: 11,008.042a mama caiva niyogena vidheś cāpy anivartanāt
GE07mbh_11_u:508: 11,008.042c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kāruṇyāt prāṇān dhāraya bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:509: 11,008.043a evaṃ te vartamānasya loke kīrtir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:510: 11,008.043c dharmaś ca sumahāṃs tāta taptaṃ syāc ca tapaś cirāt
GE07mbh_11_u:517: 11,008.047a idaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā tava daivaniyogajam

GE07mbh_11_u:1048: 11,017.002a sā tu labdhvā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ vikruśya ca punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:1057: 11,017.005e asmiñ jñātisamuddharṣe jayam ambā bravītu me

GE07mbh_11_u:1061: 11,017.007a yathā na yudhyamānas tvaṃ saṃpramuhyasi putraka

GE07mbh_11_u:1112: 11,018.001a paśya mādhava putrān me śatasaṃkhyāñ jitaklamān

GE07mbh_11_u:1118: 11,018.004a gṛdhrān utsārayantyaś ca gomāyūn vāyasāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:1119: 11,018.004c śokenārtā vighūrṇantyo mattā iva caranty uta
GE07mbh_11_u:1121: 11,018.005c ghoraṃ tad vaiśasaṃ dṛṣṭvā nipataty atiduḥkhitā

GE07mbh_11_u:1125: 11,018.007c dṛṣṭvā paripatanty etāḥ pragṛhya subhujā bhujān
GE07mbh_11_u:1131: 11,018.010c svasya bandhoḥ śiraḥ kṛṣṇa gṛhītvā paśya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_11_u:1134: 11,018.012a tad idaṃ dharmarājena yātitaṃ no janārdana

GE07mbh_11_u:1139: 11,018.014c sārasya iva vāśantyaḥ patitāḥ paśya mādhava

GE07mbh_11_u:1159: 11,018.024c kṣipram enaṃ parityajya putra śāmyasva pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:1160: 11,018.025a na budhyase tvaṃ durbuddhe bhīmasenam amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:1161: 11,018.025c vāṅnārācais tudaṃs tīkṣṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_11_u:1162: 11,018.026a tān eṣa rabhasaḥ krūro vākśalyān avadhārayan
GE07mbh_11_u:1163: 11,018.026c utsasarja viṣaṃ teṣu sarpo govṛṣabheṣv iva

GE07mbh_11_u:1181: 11,019.006c adyāpi na jahāty enaṃ lakṣmīr bharatasattamam
GE07mbh_11_u:1185: 11,019.008c vibhāty abhyadhikaṃ tāta saptamyām iva candramāḥ

GE07mbh_11_u:1211: 11,019.021a śātakaumbhyā srajā bhāti kavacena ca bhāsvatā

GE07mbh_11_u:1214: 11,020.001a adhyardhaguṇam āhur yaṃ bale śaurye ca mādhava

GE07mbh_11_u:1238: 11,020.013a vyāyamya bahudhā nūnaṃ sukhasuptaḥ śramād iva
GE07mbh_11_u:1239: 11,020.013c evaṃ vilapatīm ārtāṃ na hi mām abhibhāṣase

GE07mbh_11_u:1256: 11,020.019a dṛṣṭvā bahubhir ākrande nihataṃ tvām anāthavat

GE07mbh_11_u:1271: 11,020.026c ṣaṇmāsān saptame māsi tvaṃ vīra nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:1276: 11,020.028c virāṭaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā krośanti vilapanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:1282: 11,020.031c śrameṇa ca vivarṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ vigataṃ vapuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:1283: 11,020.032a uttaraṃ cābhimanyuṃ ca kāmbojaṃ ca sudakṣiṇam
